member.name: M:ReSharpedClam.IClamEngine.ScanByFile(System.String)
member.remarks: The engine must be loaded and compiled before using this method.

member.name: M:ReSharpedClam.IClamEngine.ScanByFile(System.String,ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions)
member.summary: Scans a file with specified scan options.
member.remarks: See this section in overloads.

member.name: M:ReSharpedClam.IClamEngine.ScanByDescriptor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Scans file using it's file descriptor.
member.param: The file descriptor from open or ws_open.

remarks.para: THIS METHOD ONLY WORKING WHEN USED WITH C/C++ CODE. You must create a C/C++ library to open file descriptor using C/C++ code because File Descriptor is officialy supported by C/C++ Runtime, not by CLR.
I'm currently working to create Unamanaged Library using C++ to open file and get it's file descriptor.

Remember, you can't use ANY .NET Framework internal method to open file descriptor, YOU MUST CREATE YOUR OWN LIBRARY USING C/C++ TO OPEN FILE DESCRIPTOR. .NET Framework FileSystem method like FileOpen will not work.

member.name: M:ReSharpedClam.IClamEngine.ScanByDescriptor(System.Int32,ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions)
member.summary: Scans file using it's file descriptor with specified scan options.
member.param: The file descriptor from open or ws_open.
member.remarks: See this section in overloads.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_RAW
member.summary: Use it alone if you want to disable support for special files.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_ARCHIVE
member.summary: This flag enables transparent scanning of various archive formats.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_OLE2
member.summary: Enables support for OLE2 containers (used by MS Office and .msi files).

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_BLOCKENCRYPTED
member.summary: With this flag the library will mark encrypted archives as viruses (Encrypted.Zip, Encrypted.RAR).

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_HTML
member.summary: This flag enables HTML normalisation (including ScrEnc decryption).

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_PE
member.summary: This flag enables deep scanning of Portable Executable files and allows libclamav to unpack executables compressed with run-time unpackers.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_BLOCKBROKEN
member.summary: libclamav will try to detect broken executables andmark themas Broken.Executable.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_PHISHING_BLOCKSSL
member.summary: Phishing module: always block SSL mismatches in URLs.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_PHISHING_BLOCKCLOAK
member.summary: Phishing module: always block cloaked URLs.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_STRUCTURED
member.summary: Enable the DLP module which scans for credit card and SSN numbers.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_STRUCTURED_SSN_NORMAL
member.summary: Search for SSNs formatted as xx-yy-zzzz.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_STRUCTURED_SSN_STRIPPED
member.summary: Search for SSNs formatted as xxyyzzzz.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_PARTIAL_MESSAGE
member.summary: Scan RFC1341 messages split over many emails. You will need to periodically clean up $TemporaryDirectory/clamav-partial directory (or use CleanClamavTempoary).

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_HEURISTIC_PRECEDENCE
member.summary: Allow heuristic match to take precedence. When enabled, if a heuristic scan (such as phishingScan) detects a possible virus/phish it will stop scan immediately. Rec-ommended, saves CPU scan-time. When disabled, virus/phish detected by heuris-tic scans will be reported only at the end of a scan. If an archive contains both a heuristically detected virus/phishing, and a real malware, the real malware will be reported.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_BLOCKMACROS
member.summary: OLE2 containers, which contain VBA macros will be marked infected (Heuris-tics.OLE2.ContainsMacros).

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_SWF
member.summary: Enables scanning within SWF files, notably compressed SWF.

member.name: F:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions.CL_SCAN_STDOPT
member.summary: Standard scan option recormended by ClamAV Team.

member.name: T:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanOptions
member.remarks: Use if you not sure.

member.name: P:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanResult.IsInfected
member.returns: Boolean value indicating if the file is a malware.

member.name: P:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanResult.ScannedData
member.returns: Total scanned data by ClamAV Engine.
member.remarks: This number is calculated using CL_COUNT_PERCISION.

member.name: P:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanResult.TimeElapsed
member.summary: Time elapsed to scan this file.
member.returns: Time elapsed to scan this file.
member.remarks: Only to scan this file. Not including database loading, compiling and another process time.

member.name: T:ReSharpedClam.ClamScanResult
member.remarks: ClamAV scan result.
